title: Bodoni?
content:
It looks like Bodoni Bold Italic but that central bar in the “F” makes me think it could be a clone. Can anyone help me?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831073209im_/http:/typophile.com/files/flebo_4505.gif)
author: antofa

comments.content: Is this a logo or is it text? If it's a logo it may have been tweaked a bit.
